content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, let's negotiate the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price. Keep in mind, I only respond with the sentence 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if I accept your proposed price. If I don't want to continue the negotiation, I will provide a reason why. If we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with the word 'TERMINATE'. Please make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
